> [tuckerb](#comment_11_16PUgFapj8pSnEnS1bcAGVRPtfwvQBheRG): I think it would be cool to have channels integrated into the popular page. Possibly just have channels in the same list as videos, but a channel's ranking will be based on the sum of peers all of their videos have.

Maybe with an option to sort by subscriber count when that becomes a thing.
